basics.name: Ethan Smith
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software engineer looking to gain as much experience and knowledge that I can. My interests include open source software development, frontend and middletier programming, and designing practical user applications. My passion is education and knowledge. I love to teach and learn as much as possible and want to provide opportunities to everyone to do the same.

work.summary: I work as a software and platform engineer both developing solutions on, and administering SharePoint and PowerPlatform.
highlights: Joined the company in 2017 as a LEAP candidate and refined my skills in Angular, Agile, Transact SQL, and Java Spring
Created self service and automated solutions using React and Microsoft's SPFx
Automated multiple compliance and business critical processes with Microsoft's PnP-PowerShell
Served as a tech lead and mentor for our interns
Served as Platform Engineer and Admin for the companies PowerPlatform
Skills used: PowerShell, React, C#, REST, Git, TypeScript

work.summary: As a software engineer intern, I participated in the full software development lifecycle from design, to implementation, and testing.
highlights: Used test driven development (TDD) to identify a major bug in the FX order processing code, increasing the efficiency by 300%
Added new funcionality to the application using C# and WinForms.
Skills used: Java Sping, C#, Perforce, MSSQL

work.summary: I instructed upcoming and current high school students in core computer science concepts.
highlights: I was recognized as one of the top 10% counselors nationwide and offered a job for the following summer.

work.summary: Refereed youth town and club soccer for U8 through U18.
Scrutinized pieces from machines to ensure compliance with stringent automobile and aerospace industry standards using hand tools and TESA Scans.

volunteer.summary: Assistant soccer coach for girls U14 soccer team. I ran drills during practice and managed the team during games.
